rdf:Description.dc:title: RDA Work properties
rdf:Description.skos:note: Properties derived from RDA elements and relationship designators with the domain of RDA Work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridged as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that shortens the source work without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that shortens the source work without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgementOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridgement of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that incorporates another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that incorporates another work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedInPartByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed in part by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that incorporates part of the content of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that incorporates part of the content of another work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionInPartOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption in part of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to the work that has been partially incorporated into another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The work that has been partially incorporated into another work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to the work that has been incorporated into another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The work that has been incorporated into another work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that abbreviates the source work in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that abbreviates the source work in a brief, objective manner.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work (an abstracting and indexing service) that abstracts the contents of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work (an abstracting and indexing service) that abstracts the contents of a source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstract of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractsForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracts for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.

rdf:Description.reg:name: academicDegree
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has academic degree
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a rank conferred as a guarantee of academic proficiency.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A rank conferred as a guarantee of academic proficiency.

rdf:Description.reg:name: accompanyingWorkRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accompanying work relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by the work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Accompanying works include supplements, concordances, indexes, catalogues, teacherâ€™s guides, music for a motion picture, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by the work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Applies to changes in form or to works completely rewritten in the same form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsChoreographyWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as choreography (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance) based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of movement (e.g., dance) based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsGraphicNovelWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as graphic novel (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a graphic novel based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A graphic novel based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsLibrettoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as libretto (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a motion picture based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A motion picture based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMusicalTheatreWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as musical theatre (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical theatre work based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical theatre work based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsNovelWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as novel (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a novel adapted from the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A novel adapted from the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOperaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as opera (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an opera based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An opera based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOratorioWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as oratorio (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an oratorio based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An oratorio based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a radio program based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A radio program based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioScriptWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio script (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the script for a radio program, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the script for a radio program, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a television program based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A television program based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the screenplay for a television program, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the screenplay for a television program, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoGameWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video game (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a video game based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video game based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the screenplay for a video, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the screenplay for a video, based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a video based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video based on the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that modifies the source work for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Applies to changes in form or to works completely rewritten in the same form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that modifies the source work for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedInVerseAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted in verse as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a literary composition in verse form adapted from the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A literary composition in verse form adapted from the source work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work to which is added brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the content of the work; it is usually added at the end of the work, but is sometimes issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work to which is added brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the content of the work; it is usually added at the end of the work, but is sometimes issued separately.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that consists of brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the text of the predominant work; it is usually added at the end of the content, but is sometimes issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that consists of brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the text of the predominant work; it is usually added at the end of the content, but is sometimes issued separately.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addressee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has addressee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body to whom a work or part of a work is addressed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body to whom a work or part of a work is addressed.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysed in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that examines the source work to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that examines the source work to identify its components and their relations.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person or corporate body who appeals the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person or corporate body who appeals the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellantCorporateBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant corporate body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body who appeals the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellantPerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant person
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person who appeals the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person or corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person or corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appelleeCorporateBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee corporate body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appelleePerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee person
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person against whom an appeal is taken on the decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is augmented by another work that consists of material that is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; the augmenting work can either come at the end of the content, or be issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is augmented by another work that consists of material that is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; the augmenting work can either come at the end of the content, or be issued separately.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that forms an augmenting part of another work which is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; it can either be material which comes at the end of the content of the predominant work, or be issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that forms an augmenting part of another work which is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; it can either be material which comes at the end of the content of the predominant work, or be issued separately.

rdf:Description.reg:name: architect
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has architect
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating an architectural design, including a pictorial representation intended to show how a building, etc., will look when completed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating an architectural design, including a pictorial representation intended to show how a building, etc., will look when completed.

rdf:Description.reg:name: artist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work by conceiving, and often implementing, an original graphic design, drawing, painting, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work by conceiving, and often implementing, an original graphic design, drawing, painting, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmentation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content is added to by another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content is added to by another work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmented by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that adds to the content of a predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that adds to the content of a predominant work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: author
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has author
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work that is primarily textual in content, regardless of media type (e.g., printed text, spoken word, electronic text, tactile text) or genre (e.g., poems, novels, screenplays, blogs).
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Use also for persons, etc., creating a new work by paraphrasing, rewriting, or adapting works by another creator if the modification has substantially changed the nature and content of the original or changed the medium of expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work that is primarily textual in content, regardless of media type (e.g., printed text, spoken word, electronic text, tactile text) or genre (e.g., poems, novels, screenplays, blogs).

rdf:Description.reg:name: basedOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is based on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as the source for a derivative work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as the source for a derivative work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: bookArtist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has book artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an artist responsible for creating art works that exploit the book form or alter its physical structure as part of the content of the work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An artist responsible for creating art works that exploit the book form or alter its physical structure as part of the content of the work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaComposedForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza composed for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.

rdf:Description.reg:name: calligrapher
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has calligrapher
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an artist responsible for creating a work of calligraphy where the focus of interest lies in the aesthetic value of its penmanship or graphic artistry, regardless of whether the same person, etc., also authored the inscribed text.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An artist responsible for creating a work of calligraphy where the focus of interest lies in the aesthetic value of its penmanship or graphic artistry, regardless of whether the same person, etc., also authored the inscribed text.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cartographer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has cartographer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a map, atlas, globe, or other cartographic work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a map, atlas, globe, or other cartographic work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choreographer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work of movement.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a work of movement.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographicAdaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreographic adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance).
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance).

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses the choreography of the related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses the choreography of the related work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides the choreography for use in the related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides the choreography for use in the related work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commemoration
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commemoration
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work commemorated by the other work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work commemorated by the other work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commemorationOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commemoration of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work created to commemorate the other work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work created to commemorate the other work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on the described work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on the described work

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnexpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as the basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commissioningBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commissioning body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for commissioning a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for commissioning a work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: compiler
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has compiler
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a new work (e.g., a bibliography, a directory) by selecting, arranging, aggregating, and editing data, information, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a new work (e.g., a bibliography, a directory) by selecting, arranging, aggregating, and editing data, information, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: complementedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is complemented by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work paired with another work without either work being considered to predominate.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work paired with another work without either work being considered to predominate.

rdf:Description.reg:name: composer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has composer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for creating a musical work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e. an index of all the words in the predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e. an index of all the words in the predominant work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceWork

rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to the class of user for which the content of a resource is intended, or for whom the content is considered suitable.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The class of user for which the content of a resource is intended, or for whom the content is considered suitable.
